segments.text: Can I have your key and room number , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here's your bill , sir . Could you please check it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's all right . Please charge it to my credit card .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are , sir . You're all set . I hope you enjoyed your stay . And that next time you're in town , you will stay with us again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will . Where can I leave my luggage ? I really want to leave after lunch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The bell captain will put it in the storage room . When you're ready to leave , you can claim your luggage from him .
segments.speaker: S1
